summary: A young real estate broker is planning a romantic meeting with her boyfriend in an old apartment building. But the couple is forced to fight for their lives, when a group of murderers is trying to kill them.
cast: Ingrid García Jonsson|Bruno Sevilla|Oriol Tarrida Homedes|Eduardo Lloveras|Miguel Ángel Alarcón|Luka Peros|José María Blanco|Leticia Dolera|Mariona Perrier
keywords: decapitation|stabbed to death|stabbed in the throat|maniac|axe murder
title: Sweet Home
